about_app_description: Jawahr is a leading provider of human resource solutions in Saudi Arabia. We offer manpower and recruitment services to companies and households to meet their workforce needs in a convenient, efficient, and seamless way.

service_1_desc: Schedule high-quality domestic helpers on-the-go for one-time or recurring visits.
service_2_desc: Our well-trained staff provide hospitality services for all kinds of occasions from small gatherings to large celebrations.
service_3_desc: Families seeking permanent staff can hire domestic helpers on monthly or annual contracts while relying on Jawahr to take care of all the administrative details from visas to payroll.
service_4_desc: Families seeking permanent staff can hire private drivers on monthly or annual contracts while relying on Jawahr to take care of all the administrative details from visas to payroll.
service_5_desc: Trained caregivers are available to care for infants, young children, elderly relatives or individuals with special needs on a monthly or annual basis.
